channel.title: Archives on Jérémie Dumas's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Archives on Jérémie Dumas's Homepage

item.title: Competitive Programming
item.description: Because I’m keen on of competitive programming contests in the style of ACM-ICPC, I thought it might be of interest to present some of my favorite links on the topic. Online Contests I did not participate in all the contests I mention, because I lacked the time or did not have knowledge of their existence before I became too old to participate. Nevertheless, they are here for the sake of completeness.
